definitions.text: a facility equipped with special equipment and personnel for a particular purpose
examples: he started looking for a gas station
the train pulled into the station
the responsibilities of a man in his station

definitions.text: (nautical) the location to which a ship or fleet is assigned for duty
the position where someone (as a guard or sentry) stands or is assigned to stand
examples: a soldier manned the entrance post

definitions.text: the frequency assigned to a broadcasting station
